about_the_game:
Soundtrack of Red Spider Anecdote: The Longest Nite.

Sample this album

This package also includes the Red Spider Chronicle, which is sold separately.

Track List

1.Main Theme "The Longest Nite" composed by Yasunori Shiono

2.Soundtrack "The Forgotten Times" composed by Yasunori Shiono

3.Soundtrack "Forgive & Forget" composed by Yasunori Shiono

4.Soundtrack "The Plan" composed by Yasunori Shiono

5.Soundtrack "Look Up" composed by Yasunori Shiono

6.Soundtrack "The Chase" composed by Yasunori Shiono

7.Spider Arc Last Battle "The Inferno" composed by Yasunori Shiono

8.Spider Arc Ending "Farewell" composed by Yasunori Shiono

9.Cuckoo Arc Last Battle "Death Comes with Anger" composed by Yukio Nakajima

10.Cuckoo Arc Ending "Emptiness is my life" composed by Yukio Nakajima

11.Insert Song "Freedom(Chorus)" composed and lyrics by Kelly, performed by collaborators

12.Insert Song "Freedom(Telesa Ver.)" composed and lyrics by Kelly, arranged by Yasunori Shiono, performed by Telesa(Musuka Tanikaze)

13.Insert Song "Freedom(Karaoke Ver.)" composed and lyrics by Kelly, arranged by Yasunori Shiono
